actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT sum(amount_revenue_approved) as Revenue
FROM public.user_totals_month a
Where 1=1
and ({{!SelectUser.selectedOptionValue}} OR (text(a.fk_user_id) IN ({{"'" + SelectUser.selectedOptionValue + "'"}})))
and substring(financial_month,1,4) = '{{SelectYear.selectedOptionValue}}'
union All
SELECT sum(amount_spent) as spent
FROM public.user_totals_month a
Where 1=1
and ({{!SelectUser.selectedOptionValue}} OR (text(a.fk_user_id) IN ({{"'" + SelectUser.selectedOptionValue + "'"}})))
and substring(financial_month,1,4) = '{{SelectYear.selectedOptionValue}}'
union All
SELECT sum(amount_revenue_approved) -sum(amount_spent) as Profit
FROM public.user_totals_month a
Where 1=1
and ({{!SelectUser.selectedOptionValue}} OR (text(a.fk_user_id) IN ({{"'" + SelectUser.selectedOptionValue + "'"}})))
and substring(financial_month,1,4) = '{{SelectYear.selectedOptionValue}}'
union All
SELECT (sum(amount_revenue_approved) -sum(amount_spent))/(case when sum(amount_spent) = 0 then 1 else sum(amount_spent) end) as Roi
FROM public.user_totals_month a
Where 1=1
and ({{!SelectUser.selectedOptionValue}} OR (text(a.fk_user_id) IN ({{"'" + SelectUser.selectedOptionValue + "'"}})))
and substring(financial_month,1,4) = '{{SelectYear.selectedOptionValue}}'
union All
SELECT sum(amount_invoice) as Invoice
FROM public.user_totals_month a
Where 1=1
and ({{!SelectUser.selectedOptionValue}} OR (text(a.fk_user_id) IN ({{"'" + SelectUser.selectedOptionValue + "'"}})))
and substring(financial_month,1,4) = '{{SelectYear.selectedOptionValue}}'
